# Arch Installer 

Automated Arch Linux Installer for Different Scenarios and Scemes.

## Usage

```
pacman -Sy git
git clone https://github.com/ghoulboii/arch-installer
cd arch-installer
./arch-installer.sh
reboot
./post-installer.sh
```
